arts.ttl: Como Predicted Lineup vs Fiorentina: Cesc Fabregas Ready To Make Major Changes After Poor Start
arts.sum: Cesc Fabregas is willing to make some major changes to his lineup after a poor start to the Serie A season, as Como face Fiorentina at Stadio Artemio Franchi on September 21st. Como vs Fiorentina Preview Como 1907 have not made the start that supporters were expecting after a monumental transfer window, as Cesc Fabregas’ […] The post Como Predicted Lineup vs Fiorentina: Cesc Fabregas Ready To Make Major Changes After Poor Start appeared first on FootItalia.com.
